charaepi_ch0254_00_gordie/2301_1101_0100:
While walking around town,
[Name:PlayerNickname ] found Gordie and the
Masked Royal having a Pokémon battle.
charaepi_ch0254_00_gordie/2301_1201_0400: The crowd is pumped to the max!
charaepi_ch0254_00_gordie/2301_1201_0500: Coalossal and I will get ’em even more excited!
charaepi_ch0254_00_gordie/2301_1201_0600: Thanks! That was a great experience.
charaepi_ch0254_00_gordie/2301_1201_0700:
Of course a professional wrestler would be an
expert at rousing the crowd.
charaepi_ch0254_00_gordie/2301_1201_0800:
You put on a fascinating show, too—better than
some pro wrestlers I’ve seen!
charaepi_ch0254_00_gordie/2301_1201_0900:
How flattering to hear such words from the
Masked Royal himself.
charaepi_ch0254_00_gordie/2301_1201_1000: Let’s battle before a bigger crowd next time!
charaepi_ch0254_00_gordie/2301_1201_1100: We’ll face each other again! Bye for now!
charaepi_ch0254_00_gordie/2301_1201_1200:
Oh, hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. What did
you think of my battle?
charaepi_ch0254_00_gordie/2301_0402_1600: Of course—that’s how I do it.
charaepi_ch0254_00_gordie/2301_1201_1700: I aim to battle in a way the crowd can enjoy.
charaepi_ch0254_00_gordie/2301_1201_1800:
I think that’s one way I can show people how
great Pokémon are.
charaepi_ch0254_00_gordie/2301_1201_1900:
Although some people think I don’t take battling
seriously.
charaepi_ch0254_00_gordie/2301_1201_2000:
It’s a shame people think that, but I don’t plan to
change anytime soon.
charaepi_ch0254_00_gordie/2301_1201_2100:
I’ll show them how strong I am by battling
my own way.
charaepi_ch0254_00_gordie/2301_1201_2200:
That’s why I’m planning to learn many things here
on Pasio.
charaepi_ch0254_00_gordie/2301_0301_2300: I think you’re already quite strong.
charaepi_ch0254_00_gordie/2301_0402_2600: It’s the least I can do.
charaepi_ch0254_00_gordie/2301_1201_2700:
My mum would probably tell me to be
more “severe.”
charaepi_ch0254_00_gordie/2301_1201_2800:
You might already know, but my mum is an
Ice-type Gym Leader.
charaepi_ch0254_00_gordie/2301_1201_2900:
She trained me from a young age to be a
Gym Leader.
charaepi_ch0254_00_gordie/2301_1201_3000:
But I didn’t like how she was pushing her style on
me, so I left home.
charaepi_ch0254_00_gordie/2301_1201_3100:
Since then, I’ve been training to be better
than her.
charaepi_ch0254_00_gordie/2301_0301_3200: Is that why you chose Rock type?
charaepi_ch0254_00_gordie/2301_0302_3400: Do you not like Ice types?
charaepi_ch0254_00_gordie/2301_1201_3600:
It’s true I chose Rock-type Pokémon because I
wanted to go against my mum.
charaepi_ch0254_00_gordie/2301_1201_3700: But now I’m completely fascinated by them.
charaepi_ch0254_00_gordie/2301_1201_3800:
I’m fighting every day to change the image that
Rock-type Pokémon are boorish.
charaepi_ch0254_00_gordie/2301_1201_4300:
It’s going to be a tough road, but I don’t plan
on stopping.
charaepi_ch0254_00_gordie/2301_1201_4400:
I’ll show you our determination to reach our ideals
through battle—just like climbing a steep cliff.
